translations: 随便的；即时的；无准备的；即席的

sentences.sentence: He was very offhand with me.
I don't know offhand how much we made last year.
sentences.translation: 我一时还真说不清我们去年赚了多少钱。

sentences.sentence: Consumers found the attitude of its staff offhand and generally offensive to the paying customer.
sentences.translation: 消费者认为职员态度漫不经心，通常冒犯来这些花了钱的顾客。
